title: Letters in Canada
additional-notes: In various years, this publication either reprinted material that had appeared in the University of Toronto Quarterly, or was a special section or issue of the University of Toronto Quarterly.

This is a Canadian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
